title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Boil the spaghetti in salted water.
Beat the eggs and mix with the cheese and pepper.
Drain the pasta and combine with the pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
steps: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice mix for at least 1 hour.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked.
Fry the onions and garlic until golden.
Add tomato puree and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in the cream and add the grilled chicken.
Simmer for another 10 minutes and serve with rice or naan.
